accounts.name: sourceTokenFeesVault
docs: Account to collect fees into

accounts.name: sourceUserAta
docs: Signer's source token account

accounts.name: destinationUserAta
docs: Signer's destination token account

accounts.name: sourceTokenHostFeesAccount
docs: Optional pool token fees account for front ends - if not present, all fees are sent to the trading fees account

accounts.name: sourceTokenProgram
docs: Token program for the source mint

accounts.name: destinationTokenProgram
docs: Token program for the destination mint

accounts.name: tokenAUserAta
docs: Signer's token A token account

accounts.name: tokenBUserAta
docs: Signer's token B token account

accounts.name: poolTokenUserAta
docs: Signer's pool token account

accounts.name: poolTokenProgram
docs: Token program for the pool token mint

accounts.name: tokenATokenProgram
docs: Token program for the source mint

accounts.name: tokenBTokenProgram
docs: Token program for the destination mint

accounts.name: tokenAFeesVault
docs: Account to collect fees into

accounts.name: tokenBFeesVault
docs: Account to collect fees into

accounts.name: tokenAUserAta
docs: Signer's token A token account

accounts.name: tokenBUserAta
docs: Signer's token B token account

accounts.name: poolTokenUserAta
docs: Signer's pool token account

accounts.name: poolTokenProgram
docs: Token program for the pool token mint

accounts.name: tokenATokenProgram
docs: Token program for the source mint

accounts.name: tokenBTokenProgram
docs: Token program for the destination mint

accounts.name: feesVault
docs: Fee vault to withdraw from

accounts.name: adminFeesAta
docs: Admin's token account to withdraw fees to

accounts.name: feesTokenProgram
docs: Token program for the fee token mint

fields.name: admin
docs: Pool admin - account which initialised the pool

fields.name: poolAuthority
docs: Pool authority PDA - holds authority of the vaults

fields.name: poolAuthorityBumpSeed
docs: Bump seed used in pool authority program address

fields.name: tokenAVault
docs: Token A

fields.name: tokenBVault
docs: Token B

fields.name: poolTokenMint
docs: Pool tokens are issued when A or B tokens are deposited
Pool tokens can be withdrawn back to the original A or B token

fields.name: tokenAMint
docs: Mint information for token A

fields.name: tokenBMint
docs: Mint information for token B

fields.name: tokenAFeesVault
docs: Trading token account to receive trading and / or withdrawal fees

fields.name: tokenBFeesVault
docs: Trading token account to receive trading and / or withdrawal fees

fields.name: fees
docs: All fee information

fields.name: curveType
docs: Swap curve account type, to assist in deserializing the swap account and used by the SwapCurve, which
calculates swaps, deposits, and withdrawals

fields.name: swapCurve
docs: The swap curve account address for this pool

fields.name: withdrawalsOnly
docs: The swap curve is in withdraw mode, and will only allow withdrawals

fields.name: tokenBPrice
docs: Amount of token A required to get 1 token B

fields.name: tokenBOffset
docs: Amount to offset the token B liquidity account

fields.name: amp
docs: Amplifier constant

fields.name: tokenAFactor
docs: Amount of token A required to get 1 token B

fields.name: tokenBFactor
docs: Amount of token B required to get 1 token A

types.name: Fees
docs: Encapsulates all fee information and calculations for swap operations

fields.name: tradeFeeNumerator
docs: Trade fees are extra token amounts that are held inside the token
accounts during a trade, making the value of liquidity tokens rise.
Trade fee numerator

fields.name: tradeFeeDenominator
docs: Trade fee denominator

fields.name: ownerTradeFeeNumerator
docs: Owner trading fees are extra token amounts that are held inside the token
accounts during a trade, with the equivalent in pool tokens minted to
the owner of the program.
Owner trade fee numerator

fields.name: ownerTradeFeeDenominator
docs: Owner trade fee denominator

fields.name: ownerWithdrawFeeNumerator
docs: Owner withdraw fees are extra liquidity pool token amounts that are
sent to the owner on every withdrawal.
Owner withdraw fee numerator

fields.name: ownerWithdrawFeeDenominator
docs: Owner withdraw fee denominator

fields.name: hostFeeNumerator
docs: Host fees are a proportion of the owner trading fees, sent to an
extra account provided during the trade.
Host trading fee numerator

fields.name: hostFeeDenominator
docs: Host trading fee denominator

types.name: SwapPoolPadding
docs: Program states

types.name: CurveType
docs: Curve types supported by the hyperplane program.

types.name: TradeDirection
docs: The direction of a trade, since curves can be specialized to treat each
token differently (by adding offsets or weights)

types.name: AorB
docs: Utility to represent either token A or token B

types.name: RoundDirection
docs: The direction to round.  Used for pool token to trading token conversions to
avoid losing value on any deposit or withdrawal.

errors.name: InvalidProgramAddress
errors.msg: Invalid program address generated from bump seed and key

errors.name: EmptySupply
errors.msg: Input token account empty

errors.name: IncorrectSwapAccount
errors.msg: Address of the provided swap token account is incorrect

errors.name: IncorrectPoolMint
errors.msg: Address of the provided pool token mint is incorrect

errors.name: CalculationFailure
errors.msg: General calculation failure due to overflow or underflow

errors.name: RepeatedMint
errors.msg: Swap input token accounts have the same mint

errors.name: ExceededSlippage
errors.msg: Swap instruction exceeds desired slippage limit

errors.name: InvalidCloseAuthority
errors.msg: Token account has a close authority

errors.name: InvalidFreezeAuthority
errors.msg: Pool token mint has a freeze authority

errors.name: IncorrectFeeAccount
errors.msg: Pool fee token account incorrect

errors.name: ZeroTradingTokens
errors.msg: Given pool token amount results in zero trading tokens

errors.name: FeeCalculationFailure
errors.msg: Fee calculation failed due to overflow, underflow, or unexpected 0

errors.name: ConversionFailure
errors.msg: Conversion to u64 failed with an overflow or underflow

errors.name: InvalidFee
errors.msg: The provided fee does not match the program owner's constraints

errors.name: UnsupportedCurveType
errors.msg: The provided curve type is not supported by the program owner

errors.name: InvalidCurve
errors.msg: The provided curve parameters are invalid

errors.name: UnsupportedCurveOperation
errors.msg: The operation cannot be performed on the given curve

errors.name: WithdrawalsOnlyMode
errors.msg: The operation cannot be performed because the pool is in withdrawals only mode

errors.name: IncorrectTradingMint
errors.msg: Address of the provided trading token mint is incorrect

errors.name: InsufficientPoolTokenFunds
errors.msg: Insufficient funds in the pool token account

errors.name: InvaliPoolAdmin
errors.msg: Pool admin is not correct

errors.name: InvalidTokenExtension
errors.msg: Token 2022 extension is not supported
